mapper.select: select s.scrap_no scrap_no, r.recruitment_no recruitment_no, s.member_no member_no, r.name name, r.title title, cExe.title experience_title, cEdu.title education_title, cWor.title work_title, r.addr2 addr, r.end_date end_date from tb_recruitment r inner join tb_user_scrap s on s.recruitment_no = r.recruitment_no inner join tb_code cExe on r.experience_id = cExe.code inner join tb_code cEdu on r.education_id = cEdu.code inner join tb_code cWor on r.work_id = cWor.code where s.member_no = #{memberNo} limit #{page.begin}, 10
